title: Tales from the Borderlands: Episodes 1-5
body:
Tales from the Borderlands: Episodes 1-5


Genres/Tags: Adventure, 3D, Science fiction
Company: Telltale Games
Languages: RUS/ENG
Original Size: 7.9 GB
Repack Size: 2.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / LATER KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Tales.from.the.Borderlands.Episode.5-CODEX ISO release: codex-tales.from.the.borderlands.episode.5.iso (8,501,788,672 bytes)
  • Optional Russian translation from Tolma4 Team added (v1.4)
  • 100% Lossless & but NOT MD5 Perfect: encryption was removed from some game archives, but original compression is preserved, so you won’t experience any lagging during gameplay unlike with repacks with all resources decompressed
  • Episodes 1-5 included
  • NOTHING ripped, game resources were decrypted & unpacked
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 7.9 to 2.8 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~8 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~15 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~30 minutes on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 9 GB
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Tales from the Borderlands is a five part episodic game series from the creators of The Wolf Among Us and The Walking Dead: A Telltale Games Series. Set on the unforgiving world of Pandora after the events seen in Borderlands 2, this is a story full of Borderlands’ trademark humor, following two adventurers on their quest for greatness.

You’ll play as Rhys, a Hyperion ‘suit’ with dreams of being the next Handsome Jack, and Fiona, a Pandoran con artist looking to score her biggest ever swindle. Thrown together as unwilling partners in an adventure to recover cash they both think is theirs, their journey will take you on a wild ride where gangsters, bandit lords, and Vault Hunters are just some of the obstacles you’ll encounter, in this new take on the award-winning universe created by Gearbox Software.

Game Features

  • Play as Rhys, on a mission to make Hyperion his
  • Play as Fiona, on a mission to make the money hers (all of it)
  • Explore Pandora as never before: familiar and new locations brought to life as more than mere cannon fodder
  • Your choices matter, changing the story around you, and making the tale yours

Unlike my previous repack, this one takes just the same amount the space as original, installs faster and doesn’t lag while running from HDD.
